branchCategory.name: CK1-Z/CKG1-Z, Clamp Cylinder, Magnetic Field Resistant Auto Switch (Band Mounting Style)
branchCategory.description: <p>The CK1-Z series is a clamp cylinder available in two styles of clevis widths (16.5mm, 19.5mm).  It is a non-lube, compact, lightweight cylinder with a built-in speed controller.  The CK1-Z is available in 3 bore sizes with stroke lengths up to 150mm.  Options include easy speed adjustments, rod attachments and auto switch capabilities.</p>

breadCrumb.name: CK1-Z/CKG1-Z, Cylinder, Magnetic Field Resistant Auto Switch
